summary: An ordinance relating to the area annexed to the City on January 4, 1954, creating positions in various City Departments in connection with service thereto, fixing compensation, authorizing expenditures for supplies, expenses and betterments therefor, making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund, declaring the emergency therefor and reimbursing said Fund by appropriations from the Cumulative Reserve Fund, the City Street Fund and from the surplus in the General Fund respectively.
